title: Reminder that even ARAM isn't "fun" anymore
body:
Broken issues complained about for years and newly added ones.
Rito, I know you love your fucking right-clickers class and you keep nerfing everything around them while overbuffing them.

Now address ARAM please, {{item:3083}} is against the concept of this mode, dark harvest turns tank into assassins, {{champion:45}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:115}} have been sitting at 60+ % winrate for years now, ARAM only accounts are still a thing after 3 years

I only play this mode and I know a lot of players do too, stop ignoring us

replies.body: I find duskblade blitzcrank to be fun.
